EinsUndEinsUpdateDnsEntryUrl: URL to POST the DNS entry change to.
EinsUndEinsDnsEntryTtl: Time to live for the DNS entry in seconds. (only certain values are supported by 1&1; i.e. 3600 and 7200).
EinsUndEinsCookie: Cookie for Authenticating the POST request.
FreeDNSCookie: Cookie for Authenticating the POST request.
